name: Neon Remnants
description:
Neon Remnants is a singleplayer Roguelike with Hack&Slash oriented combat set on a post-apocalyptic planet Earth that puts you in the shoes of a hero trying to survive day to day life by keeping his only source of light on while facing powerful enemies. The graphic style is stylized 3D and is oriented to an audience of hardcore gamers. It's only available in English.

  • Inspired by games like Hades, Moonlighter and Death's Door.
  • 3D art style with semi-realistic environments, stylized characters and textures.
  • Gameplay with complex mechanics oriented to a hardcore audience.

Road map coming soon.
